message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a competitive price of $120. I believe it offers excellent value, even at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $110?
I'm still a bit above my budget, could you consider $100?
